column2: TENNESSEE DMV TEST
Question Text
1. Your license can be suspended if you are under 21 and drive with a BAC of:
2. After you stop for a school bus, you must:
column4: wait until the red lights stop flashing.
column6: pass the bus before the red lights stop flashing.

column2: 3. At intersections where two or more drivers stop at STOP signs at the same time and they are at right angles:
column4: the driver who is late for work has the right-of-way.
column6: the driver on the right must yield to the driver on the left.
column8: the driver on the left must yield to the driver on the right.

column2: 4. When the traffic light is green, but traffic is blocking the intersection, drivers should:
column4: enter the intersection and wait for traffic to clear.
column6: not enter the intersection until they can get completely across.
column8: honk their horn to establish their right-of-way.

column2: 5. Which of the following substances can affect the ability to drive?
column6: Cold tablets containing codeine or antihistamines.

column2: 6. Parking is not allowed:
column4: on the road side of a parked vehicle.

column2: 7. Before changing lanes or attempting to pass another vehicle, you should:
column4: check your blind spots and, mirrors.
column6: signal your intention before changing lanes.

column2: 8. Driving under the influence (DUI) for a first conviction is determined by a blood alcohol concentration (BAC) of:
9. Which shape is a railroad advance warning sign?
10. This road sign means:
11. What is the main reason night driving is more difficult than daytime driving?
column6: The use of headlight is required by law.

column2: 12. This signal means:
13. When approaching a construction site, drivers should:
column4: accelerate to get out of the way quickly.
column6: honk their horn to alert construction workers of their presence.
column8: slow down and adjust their driving manner.

column2: 14. This sign means:
column8: The road to the right is for one-way traffic only

column2: 15. More than one vehicle is approaching a four-way stop sign. Who has the right of way?
column4: The last driver to reach the intersection.
column8: The first driver to reach the intersection and stop.

column2: 16. This yellow sign means:
17. An emergency vehicle that uses lights and a siren can be unpredictable. Why?
column4: Emergency vehicle drivers are not required to be careful.
column6: The driver can legally pass red lights.
column8: Emergency vehicles must go faster than the posted speed limit when it is safe to do so.

column2: 18. You reach an intersection that is not controlled at the same time as a driver on your right, and both of you prepare to go straight. Who has the right-of-way?
19. Your BAC depends on:
column4: how much time passes between drinks.

column2: 20. This road sign warns drivers that:
column4: vehicles must leave the pavement immediately.
column6: the road surface ahead changes to a low-type surface or earth road.
column8: the dirt on the side of the road is soft.

column2: 21. A solid yellow line next to a broken yellow line means that vehicles:
column4: next to the solid line may pass.
column6: next to the broken line may pass.

column2: 22. Who is most at risk?
column8: Drivers who are driving long distances without rest breaks.

column2: 23. If you plan to pass another vehicle, you should:
column4: not assume the other driver will make space for you to return to your lane.
column6: assume the other driver will let you pass if you use your turn signal.
column8: assume the other driver will maintain a constant speed.

column2: 24. To drive defensively you should:
column4: keep your eyes moving to look for possible hazards.
column6: always put one car length between you and the car ahead.
column8: look only at the car in front of you while driving.

column2: 25. Drivers should maintain a two-second safe following distance when driving at:
26. This sign indicates:
27. Drivers may need more space in front of their vehicle:
column6: when carrying a heavy load or pulling a trailer.

column2: 28. Which sign has white letters on a red background?
29. Give the right-of-way to any pedestrian:
column4: on the opposite side of the street.
column8: if you have the green light.

column2: 30. _______ signs provide regulations or important information.
